feed.title: DAVx⁵ Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for DAVx⁵: v4.4.9-ose
entry.content:
What's Changed

New features

  • Add VAPID support to Collection entity by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1376

Bug fixes

  • Original string for webdav_add_mount_empty_more_info broken by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1354
  • Debug Info does not contain actual error by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1362
  • Avoid NPE when missing DTSTART for recurring events by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1336
  • Fixed paddings on horizontal mode by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1353
  • Fix 4.4.9 release compile error by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1386

Refactoring

  • Refactor SharedPreferences edits to use Kotlin extension function by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1382

Other changes

  • Enable dependabot for Github Actions by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1363
  • Update dependencies, including dav4jvm by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1374
  • Update Screenshots by @devvv4ever in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1380

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/compare/v4.4.8-ose...v4.4.9-ose

entry.title: New release for DAVx⁵: v4.4.10-ose
entry.content:
What's Changed

New features

  • Sync after sync flag or forceReadOnly flag of a collection are changed by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1383
  • [Push] Support UnifiedPush Connector 3.x, VAPID, Encryption, Google FCM by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1325
  • [Push] Better title/description for Google FCM in UI by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1424
  • Send Push-Dont-Notify header by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1444

Bug fixes

  • Hide "keep permissions" in API 29 and below by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1400
  • NPE when trying to log in without specifying an email by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1401
  • Fix non-suspending DB access on main thread in accountRepository.delete() by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1409
  • [Push] Fix various subscription problems by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1411
  • Upgrade about libs to 12.1.0 by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1416
  • Fix UnifiedPushService tests by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1420

Refactoring

  • Use ProGuard rules from libraries by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1387
  • Use R8 full mode by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1397
  • Test coroutines with runTest instead of runBlocking by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1399
  • Update AboutLibraries to 12.0.0 by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1406
  • [WebDAV] Refactor coroutine usage by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1405
  • Drop LiveData by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1414
  • [Push] Don't block main thread in UnifiedPushService by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1412
  • [Push] Update subscriptions when collection is (un)selected for sync by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1407
  • Clean up app/build.gradle by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1421
  • Repositories: apply new naming scheme by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1423
  • Fixed deprecations with menu anchors by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1428
  • Use ical4android that removes ClassLoader checks; refactor SyncDispatcher by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1446

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/compare/v4.4.9-ose...v4.4.10-ose

entry.title: New release for DAVx⁵: v4.4.11-ose
entry.content:
What's Changed

New features

  • Added warning about credentials in debug info by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1457
  • Added widget with just a sync icon by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1340

Bug fixes

  • [Push] Display FCM instead of DAVx⁵ in distributor settings by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1468
  • SyncManager: directly wrap HTTP calls with runInterruptible by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1472
  • Reset subscription URLs on distributor change by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1467
  • [Push] Append sync when already syncing by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1480
  • Implemented sort order for DAV documents by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1434
  • Handle when AccountActivity is started without account by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1481
  • TaskSyncer: accept nullable ResyncType by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1487

Refactoring

  • Simplify running suspending tests by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1452
  • Make SyncManager suspending (first part) by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1451
  • [Sync] Replace extras Bundle by explicit arguments by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1475
  • [CI] Run tests on pull requests instead of git pushes by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1479

Other changes

  • Always append one-time syncs by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1482
  • Use lowercase GroupIDs as a workaround for jitpack.io issues by @mbiebl in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1489

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/compare/v4.4.10-ose...v4.4.11-ose

entry.title: New release for DAVx⁵: v4.5-ose
entry.content:
Video announcement and short tutorial

Announcement video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3TWb5U6pPYg YT Shorts version: https://www.youtube.com/shorts/fWhaLgcrcvI Tutorial for Nextcloud: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ppvt1TS8VVA

What is Push and why do I need it?

TLDR;

Get updates for your contacts/events/tasks/notes instantly on your mobile device instead of polling the server in regular intervals like once an hour.

Requirements:

  • DAVx5: minimal version DAVx5 4.5 (released June 2025)
  • FCM (pre-installed on devices with Google Play Store) or any UnifiedPush distributor app (ntfy, Conversations, the NextPush app for Android, Mozillas Sunup, etc).
  • The server must support WebDAV Push.

More Details

WebDAV Push is a very new addition to the WebDAV ecosystem and extends the WebDAV Standard with the ability to make synchronization in near-realtime. So if a file on the WebDAV server is added, changed or deleted you will receive this instantly also on your mobile devices via DAVx5.

This is especially useful for Contacts, Events and Tasks all of which DAVx5 offers synchronization for. Whenever a resource on the server changes (be it from directly changing it or if the change is being made from another device) you should get this update within a few seconds depending on network and server speed.

How-to-use in 5 steps (watch the video):

  1. Install and activate the servers WebDAV Push extension (for example the Nextcloud dav_push app in your Nextcloud App center – minimal version 0.0.3)
  2. If you add a new account, continue with step 3. If already have an existing DAVx5 account:
  3. refresh the collection list in the CalDAV/CardDAV tabs to receive the new information that the server supports WebDAV Push and check in the details view of a collection if you see either a "Server announces Push support" or "Subscribed message with a date".
  4. If you add a fresh DAVx5 account, the capability of Push will be detected during setup.
  5. Choose or Change the Push distributor in the DAVx5 settings at the very bottom.
  6. To test it, add an event, contact or task on the server side and open your respective Contacts / Calendars / Tasks app on Android. You should get the change within 5 – 60 seconds (depending on network speed)

Resources for server developers:

In order to provide your users with the ability to real-time sync data from your server you can implement the WebDAV Push draft. Although it is still a draft this solution already is working in the public. You can see an implementation for example on Nextcloud where this is being solved via an app plugin that can be activated upon a users wish.

See also UnifiedPush 3: https://unifiedpush.org/ and https://codeberg.org/UnifiedPush

What's Changed since 4.4.11

New features

  • Add app password hint under password field by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1507
  • Support Fastmail OAuth by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1509
  • Support OAuth re-authorization by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1521

Bug fixes

  • Fix edge to edge issue by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1515
  • Delete local collection if missing remotely at delete request by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1512

Refactoring

  • Credentials / dav4jvm: store passwords as CharArray by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1483
  • [Lint] Convert URIs to strings using toUri() by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1506
  • Pass state to modal drawer for automatic back handler by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1495
  • [SyncManager]s Remove authority by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1491
  • Increase SDK to 36 by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1513

Other changes

  • Replace ical4android and vcard4android with synctools by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1519
  • Redact Authorization header from HTTP requests by @mbiebl in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1520
  • Intro / battery optimizations warning: remove Samsung; change wording from "probably" to "may" by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1532
  • UnknownHostException by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1535

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/compare/v4.4.11-ose...v4.5-ose

entry.title: New release for DAVx⁵: v4.5.1-ose
entry.content:
What's Changed

New features

  • Improve IME integration on forms by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1504
  • [Google] Remove warning box on login screen by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1548

Bug fixes

  • Update sync progress bar when pending in SAF by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1445
  • OAuth: Synchronize access token generation by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1547

Refactoring

  • Update synctools and use unified BatchOperation by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1543
  • Don't subclass AndroidEvent / AndroidCalendar populate / build methods anymore by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1544
  • Set iCalendar PRODID in Constants and use it in respective classes by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1550
  • LocalEvent: don't subclass AndroidEvent by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1551
  • LocalCalendar: don't subclass AndroidCalendar by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1552
  • ~~Update to synctools version that uses explicit parsing / splitting by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1554~~

Other changes

  • Update README.md after switch to synctools by @mbiebl in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1549

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/compare/v4.5-ose...v4.5.1-ose
